title: Womens Dress
title_original: Lace Trim Satin Shorts for Women Half Slips Pajama Lingerie Micro Shorts Silk Lace Short Loungewear

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #207,165 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #638 in Women's Pajama Bottoms

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Lingerie, Sleep & Lounge > Sleep & Lounge > Bottoms

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely shorts for a cute fall outfit
items.body: These are so cute and vintage looking. I can’t tell you how many complements I got on my outfit when I wore these. I got a medium, and i am 5”2 138lbs. The medium fits well but I think a small would have worked too. They are slight on the short side, but my height is in my legs so I think they’d work well for taller people. They’re comfortable, and they don’t look like an amazon product at all. Love these overall. Outfit in photo for inspiration :) Read more
items.author: Jay B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dupe
items.body: TTS, look just like the photo. They do seem very delicate and smell like an ashtray super bad! Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Pretty
items.body: I am delighted with this product. I am going to use it as a slip because I like to wear dresses, and summer dresses tend to be shorter. The material is lightweight, the shorts are sewn in, and it is really pretty with the lace trim. They could be used for lounging around the house, too, or to sleep in if needing something really light to wear. This is a very feminine-looking product. I attached two pictures. One shows there is a side zipper which will make the skort easy to put on. Read more
items.author: Gail L

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stanky Cigarette & Way Off Size
items.body: So huge! I ordered a small and this fits more like a large. Smells horribly of cigarette smoke. Even if it fit I would not keep it. Read more
items.author: Ollie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need steamed to de-wrinkle, size up
items.body: I think the quality just about fits the price tag here… which isn’t exactly a compliment. The fabric quality is “meh” — it arrived highly wrinkled and remained wrinkled after a wash and dry. They’ll probably need to be steamed if you’re wearing them to be more visible than just the lace at the bottom. They fit me okay but the fabric has no stretch and the elastic at the back of the waist didn’t do much to make them more “forgiving” — I fear if I gain a few pounds they’ll become obsolete, so I wish I had sized up Read more
items.author: Cory V.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stiff chocolate
items.body: These shorts are just so so , granted they are cute and I am totally loving the sweet detailed lace in the front but the fabric feels super cheap. It feels very stiff. Has a light stretch to it at the waist only , but it has this weird gloppy zipper on the side that digs into the hip.the shorts also ride up. Very cheaply made. Read more
items.author: kimberly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs somewhat larger than the size
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The pajama bottom lingerie are very cute. While other's mentioned cigarette smell, I didn't get the same smell. They do run large which is problem around the waist. They have a zipper on the side so if you have wide hips you can get they over the hips to position on your waist. The fabric is soft to the touch but of course the lace could be scratchy. If the sizing was better they would be a very attractive piece of bedroom attire. Read more
items.author: LifeScore

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, slightly see-through, snug
items.body: I'm sure these would be really cute on someone, but they were not cute on my curvy body. I run med-lg on bottom, and the medium was unflatteringly right through the hips and thigh. The back of the waist is elastic, so that is adjustable. The lace is soft, the satin has very little stretch. Read more
items.author: MadameMeg

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, White, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
